TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted; you pay nothing. However, you are killed by an assassin hired by a wish-granting capitalist corporation.

I wish for pie.

Granted, but the pie is a cake which in turn is a lie.

I wish for an assassin to kill me.

Granted. After dying, you wake up, realizing you have been reincarnated as a banana.

I wish for a longer summer break.

Granted. It now is only 1 year long and only happens once.

I wish that Mr. Sark uploaded more content.

Granted, but a nuke explodes over a random major city every time he releases something.

I wish I was a robot.

Granted, now you're my robot.

I wish Sun would stop getting ninja'd.

I wish that too.

I wish General Rarity would stop replying to my posts so often.

Granted. I create another account and reply to your posts again.

I wish Sun never went away.

Granted. I'm stalking these forums 12 hours a day. During the night, my Gmail account stalks them.

I wish people would accept my avatar and signature more... or even like them.

they do and as they do they like you more and more as unexpected and your old life now miss you way too much than you could ever imagine.

i wish do not make another wish.

Edited July 31, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
missing rrrrr

(sorry dooble) granted but missed

i wish bot could think like human, and human could think like boat (no sink allowed, corruption is indead but not wished as it would be a terrible waste

Edited July 31, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
... drum roll ...

Granted, but the people who actually give you the wish crash their plane.

I wish posts in the space lounge counted towards post count.

Granted.

The Space Lounge is now for administrators only.

I wish for the earth to be tidally locked to Sun.
Granted, but but Earth is now in the orbit of Jupiter!

Granted, but a black hole forms because you didn't put a wish in your post.

I wish for this wish to not count.

Granted, but that still costs you 49.99$.

I wish I had good internet connection whenever i need it.

Granted, but it only connects to Mumsnet.

I wish this wish would be corrupted.
I can't corrupt that. I wish Korea was unified.

Granted. North Korea invades and conquers South Korea. North Korea now controls South Korea's industrial might and technology, thanks Sun.

I wish for nuclear proliferation to stop.

Granted: Nuclear proliferation stopped, after world war III.

I wish for a truck that doesn't break (Hah, me & my wild fantasies...)

Granted, but it only gets .5 MPG.

I wish for a new iPad!

Granted. Good luck putting it together.

I wish KSP was real.

Granted. KSC discovers earth and sends thousands of asteroids and explosive fuel tanks AND klaws to earth. All the life forms are abducted/impaled and the planet is ravaged.

I wish for kerosene.

Granted. Kerosene catches fire and causes your entire house to burn down.

I wish for something in a something.

Granted, but the universe implodes.

I wish for- ERROR 9999999
